HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Name of the Heroku application above (either Heroku default or your custom name).

KEY.description: Application extension key - this must match exactly what is entered into the Journey Builder creation screen.

CA_IMG_40.description: Full https URL for the 40x40 pixel Custom Activity image.

CA_IMG_15.description: Full https URL for the 15x15 pixel Custom Activity image.

ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.description: Description of the Custom Activity purpose or usage.

EXECUTE_ENDPOINT_URL.description: URL to handle the outbound requests from Journey Builder. Default value sends these to the generic request activity handler.

ENDPOINT_NAME.description: Do not change this value - it handles the publish/save/validate calls for the Custom Activity.

CA_EDIT_URL.description: https URL of the edit window page (template can be found in this github repo)
